abstract: Mother of transgender student at Township High School District 211 in Palatine, Ill, speaks out for first time, describing hardship suffered by her daughter after she was prohibited from using girls' locker room; Education Dept has ruled that school violated girl's Title IX rights, federal law banning sex discrimination.
lead_paragraph: In an essay, the mother said her daughter has suffered greatly after being banned from a suburban Chicago girls’ locker room.

headline.main: Mother of Transgender Student Speaks Out
headline.print_headline: Mother of Transgender Student Speaks Out

snippet: In an essay, the mother said her daughter has suffered greatly after being banned from a suburban Chicago girls’ locker room.
